params.headKind: Kind ID of the target (head) object
params.headSet: Set ID of the target (head) object

params.head: Head object ID
params.tailKind: Kind ID of the source (tail) object
params.tailSet: Set ID of the source (tail) object

returns.effDegs: Degree bounds for the matched kind
returns.totalKind: Special marker for total-kind (2^48-1 if defined)

params.adjs: Array of tail kind admissibility and degree limits
params.data: Hash of the relationâ€™s associated data
params.rule: Rule defining the behavior and constraints of the relation

returns.rule: Possession and linkage rule for the relation

returns.active: True if all are valid and active

allowFrom(uint32,address,uint128,uint64,.notice: Checks whether a sender is authorized to initiate a relation from a tail object

allowTo(uint32,address,uint128,uint64,ui.notice: Checks whether a sender is authorized to accept a relation to a head object

grantFrom(uint128,(uint32,uint8,uint8,ui.notice: Issues a grant to allow initiating relations from a tail object

grantTo(uint128,(uint32,uint8,uint8,uint.notice: Issues a grant to allow accepting relations to a head object

relate(uint256,uint64,uint256).notice: Links a tail object to a head object through a relation

relationAdmit(uint64,uint32,uint64).notice: Checks if a relation admits a specific kind as tail

relationDescriptor(uint64,uint32).notice: Returns descriptor of a relation at a specific revision

relationOwner(uint64).notice: Gets the current owner of a relation

relationRevision(uint64,uint32).notice: Resolves and validates a revision number

relationRule(uint64).notice: Returns the rule definition for a relation

relationSnapshot(uint64,uint32).notice: Returns descriptor and packed elements at a specific revision

relationSota(uint64).notice: Returns the latest descriptor and current owner of a relation

relationStatus(uint64[]).notice: Checks whether all specified relations are active (rev > 0)

relationTouch(uint64).notice: Touches a relation (bumps revision without modifying content)

relationTransfer(uint64,address).notice: Transfers ownership of a relation to a new address

relationUpdate(uint64,bytes32).notice: Updates the data hash of a relation

relationUpdate(uint64,bytes32,(uint16,ui.notice: Updates the data hash and adjacency configuration of a relation

relationUpgrade(uint64,uint32,uint32).notice: Upgrades the kind or set revision of a relation

unrelate(uint256,uint64,uint256).notice: Unlinks a tail object from a head object
